suite.name: Robot Framework Solidity Smart Contract Static Analysis

test.name: SMART CONTRACT STATIC ANALYSIS 1 : Run the Solhint static analysis tool on the target contract. If this fails, then there are possible code security issues or other risks.

kw.name: Run Solhint Solidity Static Analysis And Check Output
Run Process
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

kw.name: Get Process Result
kw.msg: ${SOLHINT_OUTPUT} = /Users/jgorospe/Documents/GitHub/Robot-Framework-Solidity-Testing-Toolkit/solidity-static-analysis-tools/contracts/TargetContract.sol 2:1 warning Compiler version ^0.5.0 does not satisfy the ^0...
kw.doc: Returns the specified `result object` or some of its attributes.

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.msg: ${SOLHINT_RESULT} = /Users/jgorospe/Documents/GitHub/Robot-Framework-Solidity-Testing-Toolkit/solidity-static-analysis-tools/contracts/TargetContract.sol 2:1 warning Compiler version ^0.5.0 does not satisfy the ^0...
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg:
/Users/jgorospe/Documents/GitHub/Robot-Framework-Solidity-Testing-Toolkit/solidity-static-analysis-tools/contracts/TargetContract.sol 2:1 warning Compiler version ^0.5.0 does not satisfy the ^0.8.0 semver requirement compiler-version 5:2 warning Line length must be no more than 120 but current length is 127 max-line-length 13:16 warning Rule is set with explicit type [var/s: uint] explicit-types 13:44 warning Rule is set with explicit type [var/s: uint] explicit-types 14:3 warning Provide an error message for require reason-string
âœ– 5 problems (0 errors, 5 warnings)
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

test.name: SMART CONTRACT STATIC ANALYSIS 2 : Run the Surya code property graph analysis tool on the target contract. If this fails, then there are possible code risks or vulnerabilities.
